full_text: The Christmas Caramel is worked in the round on double-pointed needles or using the Magic Loop technique. At the end the caramel is stuffed with yarn scraps or filling. Length: 10 cm [4 inches] Needles: 3 mm [US2½] double-pointed needles or a long circular needle for Magic Loop Materials: Double Sunday by Sandnes Garn (50 g = 108 m [118 yds]) or Heavy Merino by Knitting for Olive (50 g = 125 m [137 yds]) or Peruvian Highland Wool by Filcolana (50 g = 100 m [109 yds]) Approx. 6-10 g for main color (light) and approx. 3-5 g for stripe color (dark), optionally filling Difficulty: ★ ★ (2 out of 5) See the classification of difficulty here. The white and blue Christmas Caramel is knitted in Double Sunday by Sandnes Garn in the colors Almond [2511] and Night sky [5591]. The white and green Christmas Caramel is knitted in Double Sunday by Sandnes Garn in the colors Almond [2511] and Matcha [9564]. The white and pink Christmas Caramel is knitted in Double Sunday by Sandnes Garn in the colors Almond [2511] and Shocking pink [4626]. The white and burgundy Christmas Caramel is knitted in Heavy Merino by Knitting for Olive in the colors Hvede and Bordeaux.
